column1:
Overall Sentiment Percentages:

Cleaniness: 57.7%
Amenities: 67.3%
Location: 64.1%
Services: 63.8%
General: 66.3%
Value: 61.4%

Suggestions to Improve:

Cleaniness: Adopt better cleaning practices and invest in more training for the staff in charge of cleaning.
Amenities: Expand the amenities offered or upgrade existing facilities.
Location: Invest in improving the surrounding areas to create a better atmosphere and provide more attractions.
Services: Increase staffing and invest in more teamwork training to foster better customer service.
General: Examine customer feedback more thoroughly and adjust policies and procedures accordingly.
Value: Invest in discounts or loyalty programs to encourage customers to return, as well as invest in lower-priced alternatives.
